subject: Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: The Indy Racing League is offering team owners in the rival Champ Car World Series free cars and engines in a bid to reunite the two open-wheel racing circuits. Owners who move to the I.R.L. would also receive $1.2 million in cash, the same compensation offered to all teams that commit to race the full season.
